channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bill Pascrell Jr., 14-Term House Democrat From N.J., Dies at 87
item.description: An outspoken progressive, he vigorously opposed President Donald J. Trump and focused on legislation to help “regular Americans pay their bills.”

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Israel and Hezbollah Exchange Strikes Amid Fears of Escalation
item.description: The Israeli military said it had hit weapons facilities, prompting Hezbollah to target an Israeli base, as tit-for-tat strikes continued across the Le...

item.title: Investors pulled nearly $0.5 trillion in 2020’s market turbulence—then missed the rally
item.description: "If you buy high and sell low, your return will lag the buy-and-hold return."

item.title: Ford Pulls Back Its Electric Vehicle Push
item.description: The automaker said it would invest less in battery-powered cars and scrap a planned electric three-row sport utility vehicle.

item.title: Ultra-Orthodox Israelis Protest Conscription at Draft Center in Jerusalem
item.description: Protests over military conscription highlight the rising tensions surrounding a court order overturning a decades-long exemption for the religious com...

item.title: Forget the 30-year mortgage: The 40-year mortgage needs to become the new American standard, former Obama advisor says

item.title: U.S. Added 818,000 Fewer Jobs Than Reported Earlier
item.description: The Labor Department issued revised figures for the 12 months through March that point to greater economic fragility.

item.title: U.S. Sanctions Former Haitian President for Drug Trafficking
item.description: The Treasury Department said former President Michel Martelly’s actions have contributed significantly to the unraveling of security in the country.

item.title: AI finds a new adversary in Procreate CEO as tides shift against Silicon Valley’s latest craze
item.description: “I really f— hate generative AI," CEO James Cuda said.

item.title: Four Bodies From Bayesian Yacht Found in Sicily

item.title: Melissa Gilbert of ‘Little House on the Prairie’ fame has misophonia. What does that mean?
item.description: Yes, there's a reason you feel agitated when you hear someone chew, slurp, or tap.

item.title: Climate Change Is Not a Key Talking Point for Harris Campaign
item.description: President Biden made climate change a cornerstone of his agenda. Vice President Kamala Harris has yet to detail her own plan.

item.title: California braces for possible ultra-rare August snow
item.description: It would be the first in 20 years.
